/**
 * Notification Service
 * Bildirim servisi
 */import toast from'react-hot-toast';class NotificationServiceImpl{constructor(){this.defaultOptions={duration:4000,position:'top-right'};}success(message,options){return toast.success(message,{duration:(options===null||options===void 0?void 0:options.duration)||this.defaultOptions.duration,position:(options===null||options===void 0?void 0:options.position)||this.defaultOptions.position,style:options===null||options===void 0?void 0:options.style,className:options===null||options===void 0?void 0:options.className,id:options===null||options===void 0?void 0:options.id});}error(message,options){return toast.error(message,{duration:(options===null||options===void 0?void 0:options.duration)||6000,// Longer duration for errors
position:(options===null||options===void 0?void 0:options.position)||this.defaultOptions.position,style:options===null||options===void 0?void 0:options.style,className:options===null||options===void 0?void 0:options.className,id:options===null||options===void 0?void 0:options.id});}warning(message,options){return toast(message,{duration:(options===null||options===void 0?void 0:options.duration)||this.defaultOptions.duration,position:(options===null||options===void 0?void 0:options.position)||this.defaultOptions.position,icon:(options===null||options===void 0?void 0:options.icon)||'⚠️',style:(options===null||options===void 0?void 0:options.style)||{background:'#f59e0b',color:'#fff'},className:options===null||options===void 0?void 0:options.className,id:options===null||options===void 0?void 0:options.id});}info(message,options){return toast(message,{duration:(options===null||options===void 0?void 0:options.duration)||this.defaultOptions.duration,position:(options===null||options===void 0?void 0:options.position)||this.defaultOptions.position,icon:(options===null||options===void 0?void 0:options.icon)||'ℹ️',style:(options===null||options===void 0?void 0:options.style)||{background:'#3b82f6',color:'#fff'},className:options===null||options===void 0?void 0:options.className,id:options===null||options===void 0?void 0:options.id});}loading(message,options){return toast.loading(message,{duration:(options===null||options===void 0?void 0:options.duration)||Infinity,// Loading toasts don't auto-dismiss
position:(options===null||options===void 0?void 0:options.position)||this.defaultOptions.position,style:options===null||options===void 0?void 0:options.style,className:options===null||options===void 0?void 0:options.className,id:options===null||options===void 0?void 0:options.id});}dismiss(id){toast.dismiss(id);}dismissAll(){toast.dismiss();}custom(message,type,duration){return toast(message,{duration:duration||this.defaultOptions.duration,position:this.defaultOptions.position,style:{background:type==='error'?'#ef4444':type==='success'?'#10b981':'#3b82f6',color:'#fff'}});}async promise(promise,messages,options){return toast.promise(promise,messages,{duration:(options===null||options===void 0?void 0:options.duration)||this.defaultOptions.duration,position:(options===null||options===void 0?void 0:options.position)||this.defaultOptions.position,style:options===null||options===void 0?void 0:options.style,className:options===null||options===void 0?void 0:options.className});}}// Singleton instance
export const notificationService=new NotificationServiceImpl();// Convenience functions
export const showSuccess=(message,options)=>notificationService.success(message,options);export const showError=(message,options)=>notificationService.error(message,options);export const showWarning=(message,options)=>notificationService.warning(message,options);export const showInfo=(message,options)=>notificationService.info(message,options);export const showLoading=(message,options)=>notificationService.loading(message,options);export const dismissNotification=id=>notificationService.dismiss(id);export const dismissAllNotifications=()=>notificationService.dismissAll();export const showPromise=(promise,messages,options)=>notificationService.promise(promise,messages,options);
